snippet: Even though American and British intelligence have increased weapons deliveries to rebels in Syria, the Russian proposal on Syria has left many rebel groups feeling abandoned.
abstract: Russian-initiated proposal to quarantine Syria's chemical weapons leaves many rebel groups feeling abandoned, despite increased deliveries of weapons from American and British intelligence.

byline.contributor: C. J. Chivers contributed reporting from the United States, and Hwaida Saad from Beirut.

lead_paragraph: Even though American and British intelligence have increased weapons deliveries to rebels in Syria, the Russian proposal on Syria has left many rebel groups feeling abandoned.

headline.main: Syrian Rebels Say Saudi Arabia Is Stepping Up Weapons Deliveries
headline.print_headline: Syrian Rebels Say Saudi Arabia Is Stepping Up Weapons Deliveries
